__TOC__

This page tries to list all social networks, groups or clubs related to Ubuntu. The idea is to bring Ubuntu users closer in other contexts as well. This is a great way to get together socially.

== Social media ==

==== Mastodon ====

* https://mastodon.social - This is an unofficial Mastodon instance open to public registration. It is maintained by a community member.
